New arrival--the long awaited reprint of David Berman's poetry. Berman may have brought lyricism to life as the musical genius behind the Silver Jews, but this collection of his poetry shows that he didn't need a band backing him for his wit, rye humor, and meddly of strange characters and situations to come to life. Beautifully hardbound and published by Drag City, this is a long overdue reprint for a true poet who is missed.

#davidberman #silverjews #silverjewsband #pavement #truepoet #dragcity #dragcityrecords #wordsofwisdom #reprint #poetry #poetrycuresthesoul #poetrymatters #localbookshop #localbookstore

Haven't read any David Markson? Here is a rubric for if you should: do you like literature? Books that push the edge of literature? Do you like reading vignette/anecdotes/synopsis about artists? Do you like reading a book that you do not know if it is a novel because of the above, yet have trouble putting down?  Books that embody the Rene Magritte notion that "Ceci n'est pas une pipe?"

We heartily endorse reading this American author.

We will be open Friday from 1-5.

#modernliterature #literature #americanclassic #localbookstore #localbookshop #favoriteauthor #greatbook #davidmarkson #whyhaventyoureadthis #greatread #nyauthor

Most of us here in Portland choose not to drive if we don‚Äôt necessarily need to, whether its for our planet, cost, political reasons or to just get some exercise. I know from experience that there is a scary division between pedestrians, cyclist and the person behind the wheel of a 2 ton machine. This powerful graphic novel gives you an ominous and truthful look at the consequences of this divide! Read up! Be better humans to one another our lives depend on it!  A Recommended read!  #bike #bikeride #walk #walking #fightthepower #goodtrouble #read #resist #putthefunbetweenyourlegs #rideabike #bikeculture #stjohnsoregon #stjohnsportland #blackbikers #cyclist #cyclistsofinstagram #blackcyclist #portland #portlandoregon #powertothepeople #bikeswillsavetheworld #bikeswillsavetheplanet #read #readafuckingbook #rideafuckingbike #defundthepolice #abolishice
